issue.title: [R] Never do as.data.frame() on collect(as_data_frame = FALSE)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12258](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12258). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Using `collect(as_data_frame)` on a `Table` or `RecordBatch` returns a data frame. It should simply return the `Table` or `RecordBatch` as is.
